entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 8:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 5 with temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5 with temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
